title: Awesome Tv. worth of cost 45k range
review:
1.Delivered the tv On time and installation also done within 12hrs from delivery. 
2. Sound quality has more than expected range. 
3. Picture quality simply awesome. 
4. Installation has done without any extra cost, I have installed my tv with flexi mount without any cost by lg engineer. 
5. Packaging of tv is not good by flipkart. But the courier service people has delivered the tv without any damage.
6. The problem is LG engineer doesnt have much knowledge about that tv and he doesnt explain tv features properly. 




Thanks to flipkart for delivery of tv on time.

title: Wonderful
review: Excellent product , excellent delivery by seller, excellent experience of installing, i make my future purchase from flip kart only

title: Happy Customer.
review:
Am overwhelmed with the service provided by Flipkart. 
They gave me no chance to give negative feedback this time. 
Ordered this product on Friday. Product got delivered on Saturday morning. Installation was completed by same day afternoon. What do you need more? A weekend well spent watching HD movies(Y). 

About the product:
Great clarity, sound, picture quality. 
I don't know much about the TVs, but this product is good for a budget of 45K.

title: Terrific
review:
Supplier has mentioned that the wattage of product is 30Watt and standby wattage is 0.5 watt.
But the actual power consumption is 90 watt. Also confirmed with the installation guy.
Same situation is with the sound output.

title: Good product to buy
review:
Nice picture quality 
Nice sound
Very good remote control 
Good support from Flipkart for on-time delivery and installation 
Cons:
Not supporting MKV format
SD cable pins are back side so difficult to install normal set top box 

However, worth money.

title: Really Nice
review:
Delivery by flipcart was not on time, delivery was done a day before Second delivery promised.

Installation was done on time by LG . Product is best in it class,Movie experience is like a threater one HD movies comes alive in this LED TV.
Connectivity is best in it's class even can be connected by JIO slow network .
Screen mirroring works perfect Magic remote makes life easy .After 1month Happy with the purchase.

title: LG 43" Smart TV
review: TV is excellent working perfectly. Extended warranty sold by Flipkart is valid with LG. No hassles. The rate and exchange offer are very attractive. Piece delivered is brand new not refurbished as alleged by some shop keepers. Product is genuine LG India product and not the one sold in grey markets. Anyone can go for this without risk. Good buy. Thanks to Flipkart.

title: Amazing !!
review:
I purchased this LG model on 4th feb 2018.

LG engineer service is so fast that they gave me demo and installation on the same day of delivery.. hats off to lg service. Must buy.
